entry.title: multisig, op_eval and lock_time/sequence...
entry.summary: It seems that the context is discussing dispute mediation and the possibility of using a toy protocol and UI design for testing purposes. The author suggests that once the process is smooth from the user's perspective, it will become clearer what steps the protocol needs and in what order they need to come in. Additionally, there is specific feedback provided on the format being used, questioning if it represents a subset of the regular bitcoin transaction format and suggesting the serialization of a Bitcoin CTransaction structure with the txins containing the output scripts. Overall, the discussion seems to be centered around the development and improvement of a dispute mediation protocol.
